plot: Coming off a devastating knee injury Brooklyn Thompson a young 100 meter sprinter is pressured to take a banned substance before the biggest race of his career.
title: In the Clear
plot_es: Coming off a devastating knee injury Brooklyn Thompson a young 100 meter sprinter is pressured to take a banned substance before the biggest race of his career.
plot_en: Coming off a devastating knee injury Brooklyn Thompson a young 100 meter sprinter is pressured to take a banned substance before the biggest race of his career.
